Package game2048

Class GameModel2048

java.lang.Object
tilegame.TileGameModel
game2048.GameModel2048
public class GameModel2048 extends TileGameModel
The GameModel2048 is the central component which directly manages the data, logic and rules of the game.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    GameModel2048.Direction
    These are the directions in which you can move the character
    (package private) static enum 
    GameModel2048.Events
    This is the events of the game, and they are used for keeping track of which event has occurred the game is in.

    • GameModel2048

      public GameModel2048()
      Instantiates the 2048GameModel Object.

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(GameModel2048.Direction direction)
      This method moves the tiles in a specified direction, if the player has not beaten or lost the game. It updates the lastDirection and lastEvent.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to move the tiles.

    • shiftLeft

      private void shiftLeft()
      Shift all tiles that can be shifted to the left.

    • mergeLeft

      private void mergeLeft()
      Merges all tiles that can be merged to the left.

    • shiftRight

      private void shiftRight()
      Shifts all tiles that can be moved to the right

    • mergeRight

      private void mergeRight()
      Merges all tiles that can be merged to the right.

    • shiftUp

      private void shiftUp()
      Shifts all tiles that can be moved upwards

    • mergeUp

      private void mergeUp()
      Merges all tiles that can be merged upwards.

    • shiftDown

      private void shiftDown()
      Shifts all tiles that can be moved downwards

    • mergeDown

      private void mergeDown()
      Merges all tiles that can be merged downwards.

    • mergeTiles

      private void mergeTiles(int row, int col, int offsetY, int offsetX)
      This method merges two tiles if they have the same value and sets the old tile to 0.
      Parameters:
      row - The current row position
      col - The current column position
      offsetY - This is used to select the next row to compare with.
      offsetX - This is used to select the next column to compare with.

    • shiftTiles

      private boolean shiftTiles(int row, int col, int offsetY, int offsetX)
      This method moves a tile to the current tile if: the current tile is 0 and the next tile is not 0.
      Parameters:
      row - The current row position
      col - The current column position
      offsetY - This is used to select the next row to compare with.
      offsetX - This is used to select the next column to compare with.
      Returns:
      True if we moved a tile, false if not.

    • generateRandomNumber

      private void generateRandomNumber()
      This method generates a either 2 or a 4 on the playing board where there is empty tiles left and the board as been modified. If there are no empty tiles left, the game will check if it is game over.

    • gameOver

      private void gameOver()
      This method will check if the there are any moves left the player can make. If the player is out of moves, it will set lastEvent to GAME_OVER and update observers.

    • countEmpty

      private void countEmpty()
      Will count the amount of empty tiles on the playing board.

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      This method will reset the game and generate 2 new tiles.

    • getLastEvent

      public GameModel2048.Events getLastEvent()
      Gets the last occurred event.
      Returns:
      The last occurred event.

    • getLastDirection

      public GameModel2048.Direction getLastDirection()
      Gets the last moved direction.
      Returns:
      The last moved direction.

    • isModified

      public boolean isModified()
      Returns true of false whether the board has been modified or not.
      Returns:
      True if board has been modified, false if it has not been modified.
